name: Restful Cloak
text: A cloak you are wearing transforms into a canvas tent large enough to hold four Medium creatures, firmly pitched in a flat area adjacent to you (if there is no such area, this spell simply fails). A creature regains 1 hit point for each hour it rests in the tent, in addition to any other benefits of resting. Additionally, a fatigued creature resting within the tent for 1 hour loses the fatigued condition, but a creature cannot recover from being fatigued more than once per casting of restful tent. At the end of the spell’s duration, the tent transforms back into a cloak. If the tent is moved prior to the expiration of the spell’s duration, the spell immediately ends.
text_zh: 你穿着的一件斗篷状变成一顶帆布帐篷，大到能够容纳四名中体型生物，牢牢的搭在临接你的一处平坦区域(如果没有那种区域，此法术失败)。当在这帐篷休息时，除了其他任何休息的效益外，一名生物每小时重获1点生命值。此外，一名疲乏(fatigued)的生物在帐篷内休息一小时后会失去该疲乏状态，但一次安逸斗篷只能恢复该生物一次疲乏状态。在此法术持续时间结束时，帐篷变回斗篷。如果帐篷在法术持续时间到期之前被移动了，则此法术立即结束。
